attributes.action: Educate vehicle drivers on the dangers of speeding and over taking where against the law - (e.g. The A27 in Sussex)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The A27 is not a dangerous road - it is the maniac drivers that travel along it. More use of police traffic for a period of time making people aware of the speed limits would be a suggestion along with a national awareness that 70 mph is only legal on motorways and dual-carriage ways.
